perturbation.original_text: The Technology Access Fee will be paid in two equal installments of $500,000 each. The first installment will be due thirty (30) days following the Effective Date and the second installment will be due sixty (60) days following the Effective Date.
perturbation.changed_text: The Technology Access Fee will be paid in two equal installments of $500,000 each. The first installment will be due thirty (30) days following the Effective Date and the second installment will be due ninety (90) days following the Effective Date.
perturbation.explanation: This creates an in-text contradiction by changing the payment deadline for the second technology access fee installment. One section states it's due 60 days after the effective date, while another states 90 days. This creates ambiguity about the correct payment deadline, leading to potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: Royalties shall be paid 50% at time of shipping and the remaining balance of 50% due in 15-days after the Manufacturer's Products have shipped from the manufacturing facility.
perturbation.changed_text: Royalties shall be paid 50% at time of shipping and the remaining balance of 50% due in 45-days after the Manufacturer's Products have shipped from the manufacturing facility.
perturbation.explanation: This creates an in-text contradiction by changing the payment deadline for the 50% of royalities. One section states it's due 15 days after the products have shipped, while another states 45 days. This creates ambiguity about the correct payment deadline, leading to potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: Manufacturer shall give written notice to Subcontractor specifying in detail the nonconformity within thirty (30) days of Manufacturer's receipt of such Manufacturer's Products. Upon Manufacturer's request, Subcontractor will facilitate such Manufacturer's Products being repaired or replaced, Manufacturer must return the Manufacturer's Products to Subcontractor, transportation charges prepaid by Manufacturer, within fifteen (15) days of the end of such thirty (30) date notice period.
perturbation.changed_text: Manufacturer shall give written notice to Subcontractor specifying in detail the nonconformity within thirty (30) days of Manufacturer's receipt of such Manufacturer's Products. Upon Manufacturer's request, Subcontractor will facilitate such Manufacturer's Products being repaired or replaced, Manufacturer must return the Manufacturer's Products to Subcontractor, transportation charges prepaid by Manufacturer, within thirty (30) days of the end of such thirty (30) date notice period.
perturbation.explanation: This creates an in-text contradiction by changing the return deadline for the nonconforming products. One section states it's due 15 days after the notice, while another states 30 days. This creates ambiguity about the correct deadline, leading to potential disputes.
